description: Wolfenstein 3D is the first entry in iD Software's popular first-person shooter series. Initially, the company released Wolfenstein 3D as a shareware game that included just one episode (mission). This version of Wolfenstein 3D stored its game data in WL1 files.

Subsequent versions of Wolfenstein 3D, which included additional episodes, stored gamed data in .WL3 and .WL6 files. All versions include nine default game data files. In the shareware version, these files are named:
